Module it.polimi.demo.ingsw2024pucciruggierisantarossasciarretta
Package it.polimi.demo.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.demo.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a player in the game. This class provides getters and setters to access various aspects of the player state.
See Also:

      public void setSecretObjectives(ObjectiveCard objective1, ObjectiveCard objective2)
      set the secret objective at the start of the game. Then, the player decides which one to keep (only one secret objective is admissible)
      Parameters:
      objective1 - objective 1
      objective2 - objective 2
